website_summaries.verdict: This is a good option if you're looking for a modern stool or some extras you can keep stacked away and pull out as needed.
pros: Can be used indoors or outdoors
Handle in the seat for easy transportation
cons: There have been some complaints that the paint finish varies from one order to the next

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my "island" in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my "island" in the kitchen. Don't mind the footies, I didn't take them off yet before taking the picture. Surprisingly comfortable metal stool. Great quality, the mint is beautiful, and arrived already together. You can't be that or the price :)
customer_reviews.author: Brad Alexander

customer_reviews.title: These stools are better quality then described
customer_reviews.text: These stools are better quality then described. I got the orange and I love it, it completes my kitchen. My 4 and 12 year old like them very much. Very sturdy and you can tell they will last a long time. Shipping was fast, I got them sooner then 7 days with free shipping option. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: SM185

customer_reviews.title: Arrived mangled
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of these stools, but they arrived damaged - and not just a little damaged. One leg was mangled, multiple stools had large dents on the top. The paint was chipped and fractured in multiple places and there were large scuff marks present. It would take quite a lot of force to mangle these stools so much, they are steel after all. Strangely the box they arrived in was in perfect shape. Now I have to deal with the hassle of returning such a large heavy box. Really disappointed - would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pop of color!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase. The color is exactly as shown in the picture and the quality is excellent. This is the only vendor that would sell the stools individually as well, we needed 3 and most shops only let you buy pairs. They arrive in one package despite being separate orders, and shipping was quick.
customer_reviews.author: kjsmith

customer_reviews.title: The color is NOT distressed copper!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 24-inch counter stools and 4 30-inch barstools from Flash Furniture, all in Distressed Copper. The 24-inch counter stools are actually more of a Distressed Bronze, not Distressed Copper and do not match the Distressed Copper barstools I purchased from the Flash Furniture also. The return/replacement policy does not allow you to speak with anyone so I'm quite concerned that the 24-inch counter stools will be replaced with more of the same wrong color. This is upsetting because these are for a backyard renovation unveiling party which is close at hand. I have many other things to do to get ready for the party and did not need this hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Rissie

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Bronze/Brown Color
customer_reviews.text: As I get older (45) my style has completely changed. I moved into this beautiful apartment with granite countertops and expresso cabinets. I knew I needed barstools and these are PERFECT!! I'm so glad I ordered them and they look amazing at my kitchen counter. Pictures attached!
customer_reviews.author: TyliseS

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that's distressed is me!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered different colors of stools for a nice mix. The first one arrived today. At first I thought they sent plain blue by mistake. But out in the sun you can see where a few token swipes with sandpaper have been made. Nothing whatsoever like the pictures in the product description, which I understand are not always exactly what you get. Maybe I'll take some sandpaper to it myself and see what happens, before trying to return it. I have another one arriving tomorrow. I sure hope it does a better job of living up to the product description. I'm giving this two stars instead of one only because structurally the stool is fine.
customer_reviews.author: cavenewt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Stools!
customer_reviews.text: There stools are simply marvelous! I love the color, the distressed finish, and the price is so reasonable for 4 stools. The color coordinates perfectly with my agreeable grey, white, and "seafoam" colors. I get compliments from everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: I really love these stools! The color (navy) is perfect and the distress looks really nice. The only issue I had is that I ordered a 4 pack and only received 3. I got on help chat with Amazon and sadly, they are sold out of any more stools of this color. However, Amazon issued a refund for the one missing piece, so I am fine with that. These stools are great for sitting up at our island counter!
customer_reviews.author: D.Dunstock

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy, but the distressed white is off.
customer_reviews.text: First, these are nice, sturdy stools. My minor complaint is that the finish looks and feels a bit wonky. The white is more of a cream color and goes from yellowish to blue instead of gray with the distressing. The heavier painted areas feel almost tacky, like the paint pooled. If they were going to sit in the open instead of under the counter, it would bother me enough to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde's Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great stools reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Really nice stools at a reasonable price. They look great! We purchased two of these stools individually and liked them enough that we ordered this additional four pack. The stools are not quite as distressed as shown in the photo but I imagine they will get even better looking with use. They are very sturdy and have rubber feet on them to protect the floor from damage. We are very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christian H.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to wipe clean
customer_reviews.text: After admiring the look of these sleek stools at my brothers home; my husband and I decided to purchase 5 for our new home. Out of the box we loved them; easy to clean and stackable with rubber pads on the feet. About a year has passed and our stools are already getting dinged up; arguably we have 3 active boys who use them relentlessly. The rubber pads are over rated and have torn up the finish on our brand new hard wood floors not to mention the legs have dings from being pushed into one another. Although at this point they certainly looks used I would buy them again since they are light weight and easy to wipe clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Stool!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these stools for our deck for additional seating for guests in 2017. I was not sure how comfortable they would be to sit on without a back, but they are very comfortable. After purchasing, my husband and I couldn't believe how many bars and restaurants we saw using these stools. They conveniently stack in a corner when not in use. Still look like new! Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ackley

customer_reviews.title: Red is... kinda not red
customer_reviews.text: The color is the only thing that is not what I expected. I read as many reviews as I could and most claimed this was a fire engine/cherry red... I think all the distressing makes it more of a burnt orange? Even the parts that are full color don’t look very red though... it doesn’t exactly go with the red theme in my kitchen so I’m a little sad. Really though, delivery was quick, the stools are sturdy and as described. Just be wary of the red.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrstip

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This stool in purple is my third purchase from Flash furniture. The color is a beautiful shade of purple. I also own the turquoise and black. The stool is very well made and strong. It is also lightweight. I stack the stools sometimes and they are easy to both stack and unstack. I highly recommend the their furniture. They are comfortable and I don't worry about their sturdiness. I am currently using them in a high school classroom and they have become student favorites. My first one is several years old and still looks brand new. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly as expected—the perfect height for my kitchen table and bar area. I have chairs in the same finish and height. These stools complete the look I was going for. I would definitely recommend and may purchase a few more in the future, they are perfect for extra seating when people can come over again.
customer_reviews.author: NyBeNy

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd bought this sooner.
customer_reviews.text: When I developed arthritis issues and needed a kitchen stool, I first bought a wooden one that eventually loosened up and became unsafe. This was a replacement and I couldn't be more pleased. It's sturdy and stable, a pretty color (green) that goes well in my kitchen, and should last a long time. The slot in the top us just right to put your hand through to move it around. Overall, I would highly recommend and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These stools are a great height for the kids or adults at the island/taller ...
customer_reviews.text: These stools are a great height for the kids or adults at the island/taller kitchen table.. Or just to sit on.. We use them a lot.. I actually like them better than the wood stools that came with our table, and will eventually replace them with another two sets of these stools! Also they do not feel like they are going to break when someone heavier sits on them.. its a comfortable seat.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Counter Height Stool
customer_reviews.text: I needed a barstool to go under the counter top in my breakfast room and it fit perfectly. We live in a condo and don't have a lot of room. I also needed a counter height stool that would coordinate with a glossy white metal breakfast table with four chairs and a glass top. The finish on this stool is glossy white and it is very well built - not flimsy at all. This stool is very functional and will go well with most types of décor.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good stool, just not for bare feet
customer_reviews.text: I like these stools, however I will probably downgrade them from kitchen to garage in the near future. They're just not quite what I want for my kitchen. Pros: Solid Industrial look Stackable Easy to clean Cons: Hard seat Foot rests are very narrow which makes them painful to put your feet on when barefoot; this is the #1 reason I am going to replace them in my kitchen because we have a no-shoes-in-the-house rule.
customer_reviews.author: Hobbes_17

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are. Definitely hands down worth it. I help run a concrete foundation company with my b/f. And these guys are ruff and different around the edges. Lol. Now I only just got them. But these stools are sturdy, smooth to the touch and a great price for what I am looking for. My guys are complaining there's no cushions. Haha. Yup. I got the 24" caz the counter I use them at is 37". Perfect height. If I have a problem with them. Maybe I'll come back and leave a review. But I don't see that happening.
customer_reviews.author: Joes girl.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Stool
customer_reviews.text: This stool is so cool looking in my kitchen. It's really up to date looking and comfortable. They aren't as heavy as they look so they are easy to move around. However they are not light weight either. They are very stable. I'm buying 4 of the same with backs for my kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, not as vibrant in person
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction, perfect size. They're not so comfortable for long periods of time but I don't imagine people expect them to be. I love that they came attached and fully assembled. The color was matte and more dull than expected but still a nice pop. I'll likely add some bronze dry brushing on the distressed areas to make it look a bit more special...
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: Overall good looking and very sturdy stools
customer_reviews.text: We really like these. They look good and we use them both inside at our counter and outside bar area when we are entertaining. They are really sturdy and seem to be holding up well. We don't leave them outside, instead we stack them out and bring them inside. The only reason I am giving them 4 stars instead of 5 is one of the stools had a slight scratch and about a month after we purchased we were able to find the same stools at a local store for about a $1/ea less on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Craig J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Not 24"....a least not the one I received:(
customer_reviews.text: I'm bummed. Ordered this for use at an event - 24" height was needed for the table we are using. Instead received 29" version, too high for our needs. Also, the top was damaged. Beautiful color and feels sturdy, just so disappointed that it is the wrong size and it is too late to receive the correct size. Also, not confident a reorder would be the right size even if I try to expedite shipping :(
customer_reviews.author: Heather D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome barstools!
customer_reviews.text: These barstools are just like all the other reviewers are saying. They are excellent in all ways. I weigh over 400 lbs, and even though these stools are rated 500, I was sceptical. But all it took was for me to remove it from its shipping box, set it on the floor, and push down on it to realize how incredibly sturdy and strong they are. Also they look very nice, colorful (we got crystal blue, green, and silver), and they are very minimalistically sleek and slender and easy to move around. Even though the are only 12 inches square on the seat, they got more and more comfy the longer I sat on the seat. I recimmend them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my city apartment!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small city apartment so I was looking for something I could hide away easily when I wasn't using them. These stools worked out perfectly. I purchased a stainless steel table from Amazon and paired these black stools with it. They fit perfectly underneath it and look fantastic. I had a small get together and they were just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and at a great price. The quality is indistinguishable from more expensive brands. I've stood on it to reach things and sat on it for hours. While its not great for super long work sessions, its good for medium length tasks. The black powdercoat seems strong and evenly applied.
customer_reviews.author: CarlTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Backless red stool
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good looking stool,very well made. Sturdy and the color is perfect for my kitchen. I would recommend without hesitation. I am planning on ordering 3 more stools for the bar in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Berta M

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t slide around
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stool for my shower, and it works wonderful. The rubber feet keeps it where you put it. This growing old is the Pitts !
customer_reviews.author: Paw

customer_reviews.title: Color is more to the green scale than blue.
customer_reviews.text: It was not important to me, but the color was more green than the image suggests. Also one stool was a different color. I was OK with this since I the look I want is an eclectic mix. The stools are sturdy and the distressed look is fine, although I'll probably streak it up a bit more. Going to get another one, bar stool height, for my easel!
customer_reviews.author: al tishal otiTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy stools
customer_reviews.text: These stools are very sturdy. The color was true to how they showed on my monitor. I would have given them 5 stars except one of the stools had a couple of small flaws in the paint. I did not go through the hassle of returning since it was minor. After my grandkids use them a few times, there will likely be more flaws anyway.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie w

customer_reviews.title: Love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs. Get them! They're inexpensive, sturdy enough too. I didn't want any swiveling wooden mismatching stools at the island anymore. Finally I declared, I deserve matching stools after all these years. Something safe for the kids....Got the shorter height to reduce the fall. Kids!!! And they have a way of getting their meal all over the chairs you know? These have been so much easier to clean! And they all match. 5 kids, 5 stools. Decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Sioux V.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and well made yet lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These bar stools are just the ticket. Strong and great color. Seems that they will last a long time and be able to take normal scuffing and dings. I just ordered 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Solid stools, inaccurate colors
customer_reviews.text: Nice stools, but - as other reviewers have mentioned - the colors of the stock photos on Amazon are not accurate. We will have to be returning our "mint green" stools for this reason. They are mint green, just nothing close to the shad of mint green on the website (i.e., there is no blue at all. Even under white lighting, it is just very green).
customer_reviews.author: bethanniee

customer_reviews.title: color is off/ dented
customer_reviews.text: disapointed. the color is more caribean than robins egg blue and there is a dent when i took a pic it does not show the ocean blue color it looks like the add it has more yellow in it
customer_reviews.author: Anomaly

customer_reviews.title: colors and value
customer_reviews.text: love flash furniture metal stools. i've ordered several in differrent colors. the colors are vibrant, the packaging is secure and delivery fast. thank you for a great product. julie
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color was not as i expected but otherwise good product.
customer_reviews.text: it came with a slight imperfection in the paint, but the seller sent a new one quickly. the other 4 we purchased in different colors all arrived undamaged. Of all of the colors we purchased, this one was my least favorite as it appeared more bright and Kelly green on my computer. It is more of a forest green in person. They are great at our playroom craft table for my 4 & 5 year old. They have been durable and chip resistant and sturdy enough to not tip easily during use for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Love the pop of color!
customer_reviews.text: Love these little stools! Work perfectly for our outdoor patio!
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Color was way off
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these...first one arrived just as described, I couldn’t wait to get the second one. When the second one arrived, it was dented on the corner of the seat & it was a totally different color. One is a teal green color and the other is robin egg blue. I sent an email to the seller and they never responded.
customer_reviews.author: Ajohnson1

customer_reviews.title: Scratched Chairs
customer_reviews.text: Not super thrilled with the 2 chairs I ordered. They were poorly packaged and arrived with scratches on the top of them. Haven't sat on them long enough to determine how comfortable they are. Update: I do like sitting on them and they are the perfect hight for my counter. Would have 5 stars if they hadn't arrived scratched up.
customer_reviews.author: Teh

customer_reviews.title: If you think you like from pic you will love
customer_reviews.text: This is at least the third order of these -different styles -with back and backless -different colors for 3 different homes. Absolutely terrific product: comfortable sharp and sturdy/long lasting 4 plus years on the originals.
customer_reviews.author: kim cocoa beach

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid Countertop Bar Stool
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good size dent in one of the legs upon arrival but for the size of the stool I dont want to go through the hassle of returning it. The orange is a perfect shade that matches my orange Kitchenaid mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Mae

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kitchen. They have instantly been a hit with the kids who are now using them as their primary seating for dinner at the island. I've received quite a few compliments about them too. I find them fairly comfortable, easy to clean and I love that they are stackable. Also after a month of use - no scratches yet.
customer_reviews.author: Flower Chica

customer_reviews.title: Great stool, once you get a good one
customer_reviews.text: I had to return two before I got two I could keep because the first two wobbled when on the floor, hence me removing one star. But, when I got two that were well made, I kept them. Black/gold finish is great, looked just a little weathered/rusted without being too much. Stools feel solid and don't creak or squeak at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ffej

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, brightly colored stool
customer_reviews.text: Well packed with a large box and Styrofoam padding. This chair is very sturdy and stable/even. The color is excellent! I just love it. There are protectors on the legs so floors won't get scratched. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren999

customer_reviews.title: Not blue - very green!
customer_reviews.text: They are very green. The description is "Distressed Kelly Indoor Stools, Blue." Maybe they meant Kelly Blue (as in Kelly-Green) because they are definitely more green than blue. I had to send them back because of the color. I ordered white ones instead. One other thing! DON'T PAY FOR ASSEMBLY!!! When you check out a pop-up window comes up asking if you want to have them assembled for around $130. I declined that "service." Both the green and white ones arrived already assembled. I think that is a scam because they are assembled already!
customer_reviews.author: Cara Dawson

customer_reviews.title: modern and classy, great value
customer_reviews.text: Everyone compliments us on these stools and no one can believe how little we paid for them. The orange is a great splash of color in our kitchen. They are stable and fairly comfortable to sit on--I use them at an island, where I often sit and catch up on work. The enamel has a nice luster to it, which makes these super easy to clean, and the rubberized feet make pulling across the hardwood floor a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: T. Eicher

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality at a low price. These arrived assembled too! I give props just because I did not have to assemble them. High quality, sturdy and look great! They fit perfectly around my island. We ordered a total of 8 stools and I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Speights

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfortable and reliable
customer_reviews.text: All I have to say is that I love my purple stool in my kitchen opposite side of the island to make conversation across from my guest more intimate; It’s my favorite color too.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: love it. bought a purple and ended up coming back a month or so later for two other colors. perfect height, not heavy but very sturdy. the handle hole in the top is helpful. i like that it doesn’t slide when i go to sit. not a fan of having to hold onto a stool to make sure it stays put. glad i found these
customer_reviews.author: k :)

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and a nice accent to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: They arrived in 2 days as stated. Best part is they were already assembled, packaging was perfect! The stools are VERY sturdy and seem like great quality. The rubber feet keep them nicely in place with no loud noises when they are moved around. No dents or scratches on any. The hole in the top is great for moving them around. We love them! We hope they hold up as nice as they seem like they will.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Hamblin

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this stool to match 4 similar stools purchased from AFW in Arizona (we now live in Texas). Without close inspection you can’t tell the difference!
customer_reviews.author: YEETUS

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy stools....
customer_reviews.text: I really like these stools - I was hoping they'd be a paler shade of aqua so they're a bit more vivid than anticipated, but in fairness the photo is a pretty accurate representation. They look as pictured, are very sturdy, and tuck nicely under the little breakfast bar in my flat.
customer_reviews.author: DaisyH

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heavy weight steel stool. Perfect height of 24" for working at a bench/work table. Beautiful paint job. 4 star vs five because the seat was dented when it arrived. The shipping box was unmarred so I'm concluding the dent was made before it was placed in the box. The stool is very sturdy and would require a major impact to dent the seat. I really like the stool but was disapointed it arrived dented.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these. They fit my island perfect
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these. They fit my island perfect. I did, however, buy the 4 pack and 2 singles...the singles arrived first and they were 30" instead of 24, so I was worried that the 4 pack was going to come in the wrong size, but they didn't. I have to ship the two singles back, which isn't a huge deal but that's why I gave 4 stars instead of 5. I just hope when I re-order them, they come in the correct height. These stools are great! Smooth, lightweight but sturdy, and the handle in seat is great to move them around. They also stack, which is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if I will be keeping them. the ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I will be keeping them. the seat seems small to be something you will want to sit in for a while. could get uncomfortable after a while. But most importantly - the overwhelming atrocious chemical smell. opening the box and it just rushed out. went ahead and put the stool in the kitchen for overnight and will see if it is still smelling in the morning. if so, it definitely will be going back. not sure it is the right look, either.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnda T.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very cheery, smooth, comfortable stools for the lanai kitchen counter. Easily stackable to get them out of the way, and I love the handle in the middle of the seat that makes it so easy to move around with one hand. Solid and sturdy, and the powder coating is thick, covering up any possible burrs or rough/sharp spots. Guests love it for sitting at the counter, sipping cocktails or eating a meal.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Love these stools!
customer_reviews.text: Love these stools so much that I purchased a second set. They are rustic enough without looking cheap. The color is really nice and it goes well in my ocean themed pool house and in my farmhouse kitchen in the main house. I wouldn't say these are the most comfortable stools available but they are good for serving a quick snack or working on a project at the kitchen counter. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: L. Lines

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! Love the look, color, & quality!! They go great with my modern farmhouse theme!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price, solidly made
customer_reviews.text: We put them under the counter top in our cabin. Very good. I can stand on them to reach stuff if I have to. They are good looking and sturdy. I had my eye on them in local stores. This was a much better price and they were delivered to the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product was bent and paint was cracking
customer_reviews.text: These would've been great stools, but the paint was chipping as soon as I got them out of the box, they were not packed well at all. I do want to add that these are a bright white and the distress is not painted on. I returned them and got my money back in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel A

customer_reviews.title: Super important to know if you are trying to put ...
customer_reviews.text: By 24 inches they actually mean 24.5 inches. Super important to know if you are trying to put it in a 24" opening! There isn't anything to remove to drop it down to 24", so we are instead raising the whole desk by half an inch. The box it comes in is huge!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Lousy Packing
customer_reviews.text: Very modern and nice chair. Super sturdy. Packed horribly. All padding was placed inside of the legs, instead of outside around the stool. As a result 3 out of 3 stools arrived damaged... Ended up keeping a slightly damaged one because I was tired of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopAHolic

customer_reviews.title: Not Blue
customer_reviews.text: I have had to replace barstools almost every year or two. I am trying these because I am hoping they will hold up better than the types that have screws on the bottom braces. I have kids who use the bottom bar to get up, and they never hold up for long. These are welded so maybe they will last. I also chose them because I loved the idea of them being the blue color shown on the screen. Don't be fooled. These are not blue. They are definitely more of a green color. I don't hate the color, but it isn't what I thought I was getting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy, well-made and were in great shape when I unpacked then. I should have paid attention to realize they had a shiny or polished finish, rather than matte black. They still look good, but they do show dirty handprints or fingerprints.
customer_reviews.author: MTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive counter stools.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my needs and exactly what I was looking for. We have a small kitchen space so I wanted stools that didn't take up a lot of room and also didn't cost $200 each. These are perfect. They are light weight but sturdy and fit perfectly under the kitchen counter. The white finish keeps the area looking open and light. They arrived quickly and all 4 came all in box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy more
customer_reviews.text: We recently bought these for extra seating until our custom and much more expensive stools arrived for our kitchen island. 3 of those came to $750 while 4 of these was $180. If I had to do over again, I'd go with these as our main ones. They are sturdy and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: IT'S SARAH DAMMIT

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy and heavy weight, but easy to move around because of the handle hole on top. They have very deep rubber feet as well. I love them because I can stack them out of the way when I need to. They are perfect for my outdoor counter height table.
customer_reviews.author: KathiWathi

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: My teaching partner and I both ordered black for our classroom. I revived white and she received a copper color. Her box said black. They are a great product other than the color issue. I did not contact the company for a replacement. I'm wondering if the black color was actuallly the copper color. They are very sturdy. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but Smelly!
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs. As another reviewer said, the green is not as green as it is in the picture, more of a muted green than a bright Kelly green. They still work perfectly in our kitchen, which is mostly white, black, natural wood and green. I am surprised by the quality and shipping quality, however I can't give these five stars because they STINK. I mean make my whole house smell awful, stink. I am hoping the smell goes away soon, as I adore these chairs otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Erika L Renzi

customer_reviews.title: Great stool.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stool. I needed a new stool for my work bench, and as a big guy at 6'4" and over 300lbs, this thing is solid and comfortable. The price made me hesitant at first but after I got it, it is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Defibaugh

customer_reviews.title: No more boring kitchen stools
customer_reviews.text: I got this one to coordinate with the blue ones. The stools have the distressed look that really sets them apart. Very cool. The slit in the top actually comes in handy because the stools are heavier/sturdier than you would think. The hole makes it easy to pick up and move them. Sweeping/washing the floors is easy because they stack on top of each other well. Great product - nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: A W

customer_reviews.title: Awesome BUY! Quick shipping!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love our bar stools! They are sturdy and look great in our new house. The kids hardly sit at the dining room table because they would rather sit at the island, on the bar stool. Shipping was extremely fast and packaged top notch! We will definitely be ordering again in the future! Thanks Flash Furniture!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy & Brittni Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love these stools!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. We've been keeping them outside (Arizona) where it rains very little. They're holding up well, and they come in handy when we have parties or need extra seating. They're a little cold to sit on when it's chilly outside!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Lange

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy stool
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the finish and quality of this item. Packaged well and were easy to pull out and use right away. I like the rubber bumpers on the bottom to protect the floor. I also like how easily they stack together if you need to store them away at times. Been using for 2 and a half months now and really enjoy them! Great for our counter height breakfast area.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Jones

customer_reviews.title: I was concerned that the color was too much of a pop but I ordered them anyway and am glad that I did
customer_reviews.text: I purchased four of the orange stools to put on my lanai. I was concerned that the color was too much of a pop but I ordered them anyway and am glad that I did. They arrived assembled and protected in one box. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: adara

customer_reviews.title: Color is nice and spot on as the picture
customer_reviews.text: Color is nice and spot on as the picture. These are great if you aren't planning on sitting on it but for a few minutes. Otherwise, very uncomfortable. The seat is small (and I am not a big person) not to mention pretty hard and with that slot in the center. and the footrest feels too high up. felt like my knees were right under my chin
customer_reviews.author: Shawnda T.

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I placed these my kitchen island. they came assembled and I only had to take them from the box and put them in place. No wobbling, they sit flat on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Husband and Wife from Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Great Pop of Color
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much! They were exactly the color I was looking for and match my turquoise decor perfectly in the kitchen! They are very sturdy and were a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Wrong stool sent through Amazon Warehouse
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 30" version of this a couple years ago and loved it but always wanted something shorter. I was excited to see the Amazon Warehouse selling the 24" stool in used condition at a discounted price. I eagerly purchased it, was thrilled to receive it, and sorely disappointed to discover that my new stool measured 30" rather than 24". I sadly returned it and am hesitant to order a replacement for fear that the mistake will be repeated. Nonetheless, the stool (although the wrong size) was as lovely as my original purchase from two years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Anna McKay

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and not wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Comes assembled. Very sturdy. Finish is smooth. The antiskid tips on the legs prevent it from slipping around. I think it is a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren999

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Stools!
customer_reviews.text: I read several reviews before deciding to purchase these stools and I am so glad I went ahead with the purchase. I have two kiddos who are constantly climbing all over them and moving them around. They came exactly as described, are holding up well, and are easy to clean! I'd buy them again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Study and Pretty Color
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a whim and I use it so much more than i ever thought i would. Its a great stool to have around. The Color is so pretty. And it looks good in the living room when its not in use!
customer_reviews.author: J Bork

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, beautiful stools.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdier than I expected. Like the rubber feet to protect my floor! Love the "antiqued" look (copper undertones /marbling ). Since I do not have an industrial look in my decor, I like this softer "worn down" feel. Sizing is ideal, fits nicely underneath my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Wim

customer_reviews.title: Open box
customer_reviews.text: These stools are perfect with small children! When dirty I can hose down outside! My last set of stools were tippy when kids climbed up and down! These have not tipped. I bought these cheaper through open box. Only the box was damaged. The product was in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: em wags

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I took forever to purchase bar stools because I needed the perfect ones. I'm glad I did because these are perfect for my kitchen. I have black granite countertops with specs of copper and the black with the distressed gold stools look so nice under the counter. We use them for every meal and they are super sturdy and are easy to wipe clean.
customer_reviews.author: KRXYGIRL

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: The one I received had the seat twisted slightly, relative to the floor end of the legs, but it was about 50% less than the current price, so this might be why. Using it in my garage so not a big deal. Seems sturdy otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Damian Harouff

customer_reviews.title: Great stools
customer_reviews.text: We have only had these for a few weeks but we really love them at our new kitchen island. They are a lovely copper color. Not too heavy and sturdy. They come fully assembled which we appreciated. I like that they have a place to rest my feet while I'm sitting. Low profile allows me to store them under the island edge and out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Nan

customer_reviews.title: True to Color and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure about ordering the yellow, but it is just the right pop of color that my grey kitchen cabinets needed. If I had a long bar area I would of bought 4 stools. I was very pleased with them and they arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: CeeStaff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Height
customer_reviews.text: Looks industrial chic next to my new Shaker vanity that was too high for the typical stools you find at 18 inches. This one is 24 inches, not as high as some bar stools, but taller than those little bath stools. NB. Most vanities are now 34 inches high. Do your measurements!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height! Love the color, matches perfectly with the kitchen. Great find! If you are looking to spray paint or match anything else with these. I found a cool spray paint for the light switch plates and heat grates - Rust-Oleum 271474 Universal All Surface Spray Paint, 11-Ounce, Flat Metallic Antique Nickel
customer_reviews.author: HD84

customer_reviews.title: Nice metal stool
customer_reviews.text: My fourth chair like this. Most of this design style are identical. It matched up to the other three I had. Not built for comfort, but they look great at our kitchen island.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Leo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy stool
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for our needs. Color is a bit unusual but it works and adds a little color. Easy to move around with hole on top. Stackable too!
customer_reviews.author: jks

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE AMAZING and stack and area easy to fit in pantry ...
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE AMAZING and stack and area easy to fit in pantry or laundry room. We have 4 stools at our bar, and when we have a party thats where everyone wants to hang so we just get these other 4 out and immediately create 8 seats! awesome. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and comfortable. I bought it to replace two others with adjustable height that I had bought on Amazon and broke within two months. This time I wanted something sturdy. I got it. It's not heavy and it's reliable to sit or stand on.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar Stools
customer_reviews.text: Solid and stylish bar stools. These do not wobble, lean or show any signs that they will fall apart. They come complete, you do not need to put them together. I am pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: P. K. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: They came on two separate, large, boxes. Other than that, these are perfection! For the price I expected to get flimsy cheap garbage. But these are heavy duty, they look nice, and sit pretty comfortably! They are also way less bulky than training traditional bar seating
customer_reviews.author: Bosphoto

customer_reviews.title: Most horrific customer experience
customer_reviews.text: Most horrific customer experience I have ever had. I will be the first to give 5 stars and shout outs for great service, but will also be brutally honest when service fails like it did with these jokers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are so beautiful and look even better in person
customer_reviews.text: These are so beautiful and look even better in person. The color is exactly as shown. I ordered 4 and wish I had ordered more instead of the one with back(those were a complete nightmare) They stack so it make it easy when you need to clean the floors...
customer_reviews.author: K.Rodriguez

product_meta.title: Flash Furniture Commercial Grade 24" High Backless Blue Metal Indoor-Outdoor Counter Height Stool with Square Seat
product_meta.description: Color:Blue| Size:1 Pack| Style:Indoor-OutdoorThis stool will add a modern industrial appearance to your home or work space. This space-saving stool is stackable making it great for storing. A cross brace underneath the seat adds extra stability and features plastic caps that prevent the finish from scratching when stacked. The legs have protective floor glides that prevent damage to flooring. This all-weather use stool is great for indoor and outdoor settings. For longevity, care should be taken to protect from long periods of wet weather. The unique design of this backless stool can conform in so many spaces.
feature_bullets: Seat Drain Hole assists in drying

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,010 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
